statements: DELETE FROM community_agroforestry_initiatives WHERE project_location = 'California' AND project_start_date > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM initiative WHERE initiative_name = 'CleanUp Drive' AND community_id = 2;
DELETE FROM community WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM Agroforestry WHERE agro_name = 'Farmers Union';
DELETE FROM Agroforestry WHERE agro_name = 'Forest Hills';
DELETE FROM volunteer_participation WHERE volunteer_id = 201 AND planting_id = 105;
DELETE FROM volunteer_participation WHERE volunteer_id = 1 AND planting_id = 3;
